text:
[Verse]
Morning light breaks
Shines on my face
Warmth in my heart
Got to embrace

[Verse 2]
Blue skies above
Birds start to sing
Feel so alive
Ready for spring

[Chorus]
Sunshine days
Chase the gray away
Brighten my world
Sunshine days

[Verse 3]
Kids laugh and play
Running around
Joy in their steps
Feet off the ground

[Bridge]
Dance in the sun
Feel the breeze blow
Life’s just begun
Watch it all glow

[Chorus]
Sunshine days
Chase the gray away
Brighten my world
Sunshine days
title: Sunshine Days
